item.value:
Create CMR

  • The CreateCMR tool supports the request process to create and update CMRs at IBM.
  • This tool also accesses the FindCMR Search tool.

Help and Support

  • Access to the tool can be requested using OneTeam. For access instructions please follow this link.
  • For support, please refer to the user guide or contact the help desk by sending an email to CCM Worldwide Support/Raleigh/Contr/IBM. While this tool is in Production with 24/7 support, the data source that it uses is only supported 9/5. Please consider this when estimating response time.
